Text: thank you for this cracked version, very handy application that likes to phone home and blacklist keys.

I've got to say, I've tried most macro programs and this one is by FAR the best, it blows jitbit macro recorder out of the water in terms of ease of use, efficiency and available hotkey options.

I think it is overpriced but if I still feel this way in 6 months I'll consider buying it.

Thanks again.
